$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open') &&
AND(
(Directors_Officers_Employment_Practice__c = TRUE),
OR( AND( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$500,000"), ( EPLI_Rate_Per_Million_New__c < 4000)), AND( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$1,000,000"), (EPLI_Rate_Per_Million_New__c < 4000)), AND( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$2,000,000"), (EPLI_Rate_Per_Million_New__c < 3500)), AND( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$3,000,000"), (EPLI_Rate_Per_Million_New__c < 3150)), AND( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$4,000,000"), (EPLI_Rate_Per_Million_New__c < 3050)), AND( ISPICKVAL( EPLI_Limit_Modifier_Limit__c , "$5,000,000"), (EPLI_Rate_Per_Million_New__c < 3000)) ))&&
CONTAINS(Coverages__c, "Employment Practices Liability")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: EPLI Rate Per Million is too low
